import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], }) export class LoginComponent { iconApple = 'assets/images/icons/apple.svg'; iconGoogle = 'assets/images/icons/google.svg'; iconFacebook = 'assets/images/icons/facebook.svg'; image = true; constructor(private router: Router) {} save() { this.router.navigate(['/home']); } }
